Traits.Name: Curiosity Unbound
Traits.Content: Vorthirith is driven by an insatiable curiosity, granting him advantage on all Intelligence checks and saving throws.

Traits.Name: Cosmic Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of Vorthirith must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: Vorthirith's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells: At will: eldritch blast, detect magic, minor illusion. 3/day each: disintegrate, antipathy/sympathy, dominate monster.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If Vorthirith fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Vorthirith makes two attacks with Cosmic Maw and one attack with Abyssal Stomp.

Actions.Name: Cosmic Maw
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +14 to hit, dealing 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage as Vorthirith attempts to engulf a creature in his gaping maw, drawing on the very essence of their being.

Actions.Name: Abyssal Stomp
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +14 to hit, dealing 25 (4d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or become stunned until the end of their next turn as Vorthirith's thundering foot crushes them, reverberating through the cosmos.

Actions.Name: Void Eruption
Actions.Content: Area of effect action: Each creature within a 30-foot radius of Vorthirith must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 55 (10d10) necrotic damage, as rifts in reality open up and cosmic energies erupt violently around him. On a successful save, they take half as much damage.

LegendaryActions.Name: Curious Displacement (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: Vorthirith can momentarily shift his form, imposing disadvantage on the next attack roll made against him by a creature within 60 feet, as he becomes a swirling mass of cosmic energy, evading their grasp.

LegendaryActions.Name: Enigmatic Grasp (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Vorthirith targets one creature within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Intelligence saving throw or have their thoughts muddled, incapacitating them for 1 round as their mind is filled with visions of the cosmos unraveling.

LegendaryActions.Name: Astral Siphon (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Vorthirith unleashes a wave of pulsating energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 50 (9d10) necrotic damage, and be poisoned until the end of their next turn as a fragment of their life force is consumed by the cosmic entity.
